DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_TITLE: scMultiome analysis of human tongue cancer organoids
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_ABSTRACT: We performed single-cell Multiome analysis (10X Genomics) of a uniquely established human tongue cancer organoids, including both chemo-sensitive organoids and  chemotherapy resistant organoids.
